remarks: Composition of a function with an operator abstraction.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-Sep-2015.)
statement:
oprabco.1 $e |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) -> C e. D ) $.
oprabco.2 $e |- F = ( x e. A , y e. B |-> C ) $.
oprabco.3 $e |- G = ( x e. A , y e. B |-> ( H ` C ) ) $.
oprabco $p |- ( H Fn D -> G = ( H o. F ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d H x y $.
